name: Battle Record
description: Compilations of sounds, samples, and beats pressed on vinyl records for use in DJ performances.

name: Binaural Beats
description: Auditory illusions created when two different frequencies are played simultaneously in separate ears.

name: Broadband Noise
description: Audio signals with energy distributed across a wide range of frequencies; usually split into "colours" of noise and often marketed for relaxation or as a sleep aid.
